header_text: You are at a family gathering and see people you haven’t spoken to in years. Your chorea has gotten more noticeable, and you worry how others will react. While you can’t control what others think, you know most people will be understanding, and the day will still be enjoyable.

elements.Text: Will the family gathering be enjoyable?

elements.name:
You are at a family gathering and see people you haven’t spoken to in years. Your chorea has gotten more noticeable, and you worry how others will react. While you can’t control what others think, you know most people will be understanding, and the day will still be enjoyable.
